title: Brand ult uses mana before it fires
body:
A couple different times, I've noticed that {{champion:63}} 's ult can be cancelled if he is CCed at just the right time.  It looks like his ult uses up his mana, but if he gets stunned right after that but before the fireball comes out, the fireball simply vanishes.  Since his mana has been used, he has to try to work it up from the beginning.  If he has {{item:3161}} , since he didn't "cast" his ult, it has no effect, even though he worked his mana up to max and then drained it.

I strongly urge that either his mana is used WHEN his fireball comes out.

replies.body: yeah its called a cast time

> yeah its called a cast time

Other spells either follow through even when they're stunned, or use the mana as the cast happens.  It may take .3ish seconds from start of animation to the actual cast, but the mana also takes .3 seconds to be used.

Happened to me too more times.
He had 2 seraph, full starting mana and the mana was vanished without ulti when the battle started.
Brand needs a bigger mana pool or cheaper spells. Not even enough to support effectively let alone clear waves mid.
